forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered single antigen dose of Measles, at the minimum age of 12 months that the a second dose is recommended.
reasonForChange: Renamed to better reflect test case. V1.4: Updated Earliest and Recommended date to adjust dates out 3 days.  Previous recommendation was 4 weeks from single dose administration, but this would result in the dose being forecasted too early for the second Measles at 13 months.
